title: 2 Set 15.7'' Gold Circle Mirrors Wall Decor Iron Frame Mirrors Art Round Home Hanging Mirrors for Living Room/Bedroom/Bathroom/Entryway (Medium Size 15.7 inch)
descriptions:
Simple, stylish mirrors that are easy to hang and easy to love.

What you get
- Two gold circle mirrors (each 15.7 inches wide with frame; mirror area is 10 inches).
- Light weight: about 2 pounds each.
- Strong iron frame in a soft gold finish (not too shiny, not too dull).

Why you’ll like them
- Clear reflection: high‑quality glass gives a sharp, true image without bending or warping.
- Easy to hang: each mirror uses just one screw. One hole in the wall, and you’re done.
- Flexible style: works well in many rooms and with many colors and decorations.

Where to use them
- Entryway: a quick look before you head out.
- Living room: add light and warmth to your wall.
- Bedroom: simple elegance above a dresser or nightstand.
- Bathroom: brightens the space.
- Office: a calm, modern touch.

How to arrange them
- Hang them side by side, one above the other, or place them in different rooms.
- Mix with other wall art such as paintings, a picture wall, wall sculpture, or candle sconces.
- Also looks nice above the TV.

Good to know
- Design: “circle on circles” for a modern, artistic look.
- Finish: gold frame between matte and shiny, easy to match.
- Packed safely for delivery.

In short: two lightweight gold mirrors, clear and reliable, that you can hang with one screw and enjoy anywhere in your home.
